text: Albertus Magnus College is a Catholic private liberal arts college in New Haven, Connecticut, United States. It was founded in 1925 by the Dominican Sisters of St. Mary of the Springs (now Dominican Sisters of Peace). It is located in the Prospect Hill neighborhood of New Haven, near the border with Hamden. Albertus Magnus has associate, bachelor's and master's degree programs. Its ranking in the 2015 edition of Best Colleges, Regional Universities (North), is 115th. == References == == Other websites == * Visual tour of Albertus Magnus College Category:Colleges and universities in Connecticut Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:1925 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Connecticut
title: Albertus Magnus College
